Résoudre et discuter suivant les valeurs de $b_1$, $b_2$, $b_3$~et $b_4$~:
$$\displaylines{
    (S_1)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl}
        x+3y+4z+7t &=&b_1 \\ 
        x+3y+4z+5t &=&b_2 \\
        x+3y+3z+2t &=&b_3 \\ 
        x+y+z+t &=&b_4
    \end{array}\right.
    \qquad(S_2)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl}
        x+3y+5z+3t &=&b_1 \\ 
        x+4y+7z+3t &=&b_2\\
        y+2z &=& b_3\\ 
        x+2y+3z+2t &=&b_4
    \end{array}\right.\cr
    (S_3)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl}
        x+y+2z-t &=&b_1 \\
        -x+3y+t &=&b_2 \\
        2x-2y+2z-2t &=&b_3 \\
        2y+z&=&b_4\\
    \end{array}\right.
    \qquad(S_4)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl}
        x+2y+z+2t &=&b_1 \\
        -2x-4y-2z-4t &=&b_2\\
        -x-2y-z-2t &=& b_3\\
        3x+6y+3z+6t &=&b_4 
    \end{array}\right.}$$
value.html: Résoudre et discuter suivant les valeurs de \(b_1\), \(b_2\), \(b_3\) et \(b_4\) : \[\displaylines{ (S_1)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl} x+3y+4z+7t &=&b_1 \\ x+3y+4z+5t &=&b_2 \\ x+3y+3z+2t &=&b_3 \\ x+y+z+t &=&b_4 \end{array}\right. \qquad(S_2)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl} x+3y+5z+3t &=&b_1 \\ x+4y+7z+3t &=&b_2\\ y+2z &=& b_3\\ x+2y+3z+2t &=&b_4 \end{array}\right.\cr (S_3)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl} x+y+2z-t &=&b_1 \\ -x+3y+t &=&b_2 \\ 2x-2y+2z-2t &=&b_3 \\ 2y+z&=&b_4\\ \end{array}\right. \qquad(S_4)\;\left\{\begin{array}{rcl} x+2y+z+2t &=&b_1 \\ -2x-4y-2z-4t &=&b_2\\ -x-2y-z-2t &=& b_3\\ 3x+6y+3z+6t &=&b_4 \end{array}\right.}\]

value.latex:
$(S_1)$~: solution unique quels que soient $b_1,b_2,b_3,b_4$.\\
$(S_2)$~: solutions si $b_2=b_1+b_3$.\\
$(S_3)$~: solutions si $b_1+b_2-2b_4=0$ et $2b_1-b_3-2b_4=0$.\\
$(S_4)$~: solutions si $b_2=-2b_1$ et $b_3=-b_1$ et $b_4=3b_1$.
